name: Nearby in the Dark
description:
History:

You live in a world where no one has arms and everyone lives in peace. One day lightning strikes you and makes your arms grow and leave you blind. Since you are now a monster you have to absorb the normality of people to become normal.

Instructions:

Arrows or WASD to move. You have to stay behind people to absorb them as they run away. You have to catch all the people before the time is up, and in each game a random number of people appear in random positions.

Application of the Theme:

Monsters are supposed to be "behind you", but since you are the monster you are "behind them". The subject is a little caught by the hair, but good.
